name: Comet Cosmos
description:
This game is for PC WideScreen OpenGL currently under development for more changes in the near future. Pilot a spacecraft through the stars collecting lost astronauts and docking with the station. The intent of this game is to expand my skills and polish the game further. into a more open-world Space exploration game.  

Help out our development by taking a quick survey 

https://forms.gle/PZ6wzjbXcgRjYpqJ9
